Uses of Class
opennlp.ccg.alignment.Mapping

Packages that use Mapping
opennlp.ccg.alignment This package provides classes for modeling alignments between two phrases. 
 

Uses of Mapping in opennlp.ccg.alignment
 

Methods in opennlp.ccg.alignment that return Mapping
 Mapping Mapping.copyWithPhraseNumber(Integer phraseNumber)
          Gets a copy of this mapping with its phrase number set to the specified phrase number.
static Mapping Mapping.mappingByPosition(Integer phraseNumber, Integer a, Integer b, PhrasePosition firstPosition)
          Convenience method for creating mappings when the phrase position may possibly be PhrasePosition.B.
static Mapping Mapping.mappingByPosition(Integer phraseNumber, Integer a, Integer b, Status status, Double confidence, PhrasePosition firstPosition)
          Convenience method for creating mappings in case which index should be A and which should be B depends on the phrase position.
 Mapping MappingFormat.parseMapping(String source)
          Parses a Mapping from a given string, based on the encoding scheme in effect.
 Mapping MappingReader.readMapping()
          Reads a mapping from the underlying reader, if one is available.
 Mapping Mapping.reverse()
          Gets a new mapping just like this one except that the indices in the PhrasePosition.A and PhrasePosition.B positions are swapped.

          Reads mappings into a sorted map from the specified reader, using the specified format to parse mappings.

          Adds a new mapping to this alignment.

          Compares this mapping to another according to their natural ordering.

          Formats a given Mapping based on the specified field position, appending the output to the string buffer provided.

          Formats a mapping according to the encoding scheme in effect.
 void MappingWriter.writeMapping(Mapping mapping)
          Writes a mapping to the underlying writer, formatted by the mapping format.
 

Method parameters in opennlp.ccg.alignment with type arguments of type Mapping

          Writes the specified map to the specified file using the format provided.
static void Alignments.writeMappings(Map<Integer,Set<Mapping>> map, MappingWriter writer)
          Writes the specified map to the specified writer, starting mapping groups as needed based on the key and the size of the value set.

Constructor parameters in opennlp.ccg.alignment with type arguments of type Mapping
Alignment(Phrase a, Phrase b, Collection<? extends Mapping> mappings)
          Creates a new alignment with the specified phrases and mappings between them.
